title: Latest News from Science Magazine
description: Keyword search result for Alerts: News Weekly Headlines -- New results matching your keyword search query (updated daily).

items.title: Fired NIH institute head sues Trump administration
items.description: Jeanne Marrazzo says she lost her job because she spoke out against risky public-health policies

items.title: Martian cities could be built from ice
items.description: Astronauts could theoretically harness frozen water on the Red Planet to construct habitats and research stations, new analysis suggests

items.title: Hack reveals reviewer identities for huge AI conference
items.description: Software bug leads to exposure of peer-review records for 10,000 papers

items.title: Seafloor telecom cable transformed into giant earthquake detector
items.description: Dense seismic array more than 4000 kilometers long promises new views of Earth’s interior

items.title: NSF pares down grant-review process, reducing influence of outside scientists
items.description: Memo cites overburdened staff, but some say move also aims to elevate White House priorities

items.title: NIH’s proposed caps on open-access publishing fees roil scientific community
items.description: Policy to be implemented next year drew more than 900 comments, most of them critical

items.title: New antibiotics for gonorrhea could help beat back drug-resistant infections
items.description: Two treatments for the sexually transmitted disease are expected to become available soon

items.title: Congress imposes new security restrictions on U.S. researchers
items.description: But new defense bill drops or weakens some controversial proposals

items.title: Heat-seeking beetles drawn to plants that glow in infrared
items.description: Pollinators’ antennae act like thermal cameras to spot self-heating plants

items.title: NASA telescope will hunt down ‘city killer’ asteroids
items.description: With an infrared eye, NEO Surveyor will target dangerous space rocks glowing in the dark
